title: Isle of Garmr

properties.name: description
properties.value: The Isle of Garmr is an island mentioned in Imcandoria's fall. It supposedly lies somewhere in the Northern or Lunar Sea, possibly near or close to Acheron. The island housed an Imcando dwarf civilisation before it was destroyed by a horrible evil and was presumably part of a greater region refered to as Imcandoria. It was also home to a group of unspecified giants as well as an Auspah tribe.

content:
The Isle of Garmr is an island mentioned in Imcandoria's fall. It supposedly lies somewhere in the Northern or Lunar Sea, possibly near or close to Acheron. The island housed an Imcando dwarf civilisation before it was destroyed by a horrible evil and was presumably part of a greater region refered to as Imcandoria. It was also home to a group of unspecified giants as well as an Auspah tribe.

Freja, an adventurer and member of the Myths' Guild, explored the island once, and brought back the transcript of Imcandoria's fall. She is planning an expedition to Acheron, but also mentions the Isle of Garmr, hinting the two locations are near each other.
rawContent:
The '''Isle of Garmr''' is an island mentioned in [[Imcandoria's fall]]. It supposedly lies somewhere in the [[Northern Sea|Northern]] or [[Lunar Sea]], possibly near or close to [[Acheron]]. The island housed an [[Imcando dwarf]] civilisation before it was destroyed by a horrible evil and was presumably part of a greater region refered to as [[Imcandoria]]. It was also home to a group of unspecified [[giant]]s as well as an {{RSL|Auspah}} tribe.

[[Freja]], an adventurer and member of the [[Myths' Guild]], explored the island once, and brought back the transcript of Imcandoria's fall. She is planning an expedition to Acheron, but also mentions the Isle of Garmr, hinting the two locations are near each other.

[[Category:Islands]]
[[Category:Locations that do not appear in-game]]
